alert.note: Alert for Madison; Pierce; Stanton; Thurston; Wayne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 6:32AM CDT until August 02 at 6:45AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MADISON...WAYNE...SOUTHEASTERN PIERCE...WEST CENTRAL THURSTON AND NORTHERN STANTON COUNTIES... At 631 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Winside, or 12 miles northeast of Norfolk, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Weather Instrument Measurement. The Norfolk airport weather equipment measured a 71 mph wind gust with this storm. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Norfolk, Wayne, Wakefield, Winside, Hadar, Hoskins, Carroll, Lake Maskenthine Recreation Area, and Winnebago Reservation. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
